lines.text: Okay, trusty ol' automatic camera, time to make a couple a' bucks.
You're at the mercy of the real Green Goblin! And, of course, you know, I don't have any mercy!
So much for his plan to turn the town into Goblin City.
Wrong again, insect. There's more than enough formula here for New York, New Jersey, Philadelphia, Washington...
Mona, I'd better stop him before he reaches Anaheim, Azuza, and Cucamonga.
The troublesome trio!
Here I come, to help my chum, 'cause he is dum!
I am the one who found the lost temple of Cyttorak. I am the one who stole its mystic power. That power transformed me into the human Juggernaut, the only one who can destroy the X-Men!
I have the speed of a cheetah!
Even a cheetah can be caught!
You give off bad vibes, Shocker!
Introducing the ice-amazing, ice-astounding Iceman!
Saving your life is becoming a habit.
That's one habit you shouldn't break.
What do we call ourselves?
We used to be X-Men, Bobby. And since we're all friends, why not the Spider-Friends?
It's okay by me.
I'm flattered.
You can't stop me, Spider-Man. But, I can stop you!
[Peter, Bobby and Angelica are hurrying home]
I know. Let's have a race.
[the three of them stop running]
I'll even give you a head start.

[in a brilliant flash of yellow light Angelica changes into Firestar. Bobby freezes himself in a human-size ice block and becomes Iceman. Iceman turns to Peter, who is only half-changed into his Spider-Man costume, not even wearing his mask]

[pulling his shoes off]
Excuse me, but I've got to do it the *hard* way.
Superheroes on a bus? What are you advertising?
Comic books.
Firestar, honey, I lava you.
Where did you get your clothes? TRASH CITY?
